BeeLine Reader | Palo Alto (or remote) | Part Time | Front-End Web Dev

BeeLine Reader (www.BeeLineReader.com) is looking to hire a skilled front-end dev with Chrome extension experience. Deep JS experience required; Ruby/Rails skills a strong plus. Experience with DOM manipulation a plus.

BeeLine Reader was in the first batch of companies in the Intel EdTech Accelerator and its tools are used millions of times a week by users around the world. BeeLine Reader was recently featured in The Atlantic and on NPR. Email developer@... with resume and specific cover letter (generic cover letters will not be considered).
